attributes.action: remove the unfair and damaging "Green Tax" imposed by the current chancelor on flights, which will have a deterimental effect on UK Business and imports/exports and hits families going on holiday (as he does) the hardest.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Chancelor introduced a levy of green tax on all UK flights in 2006 with a start date of February 2007. There is no evidence to suggest that this tax will improve or protect the environment in anyway. 

The chancelor has insisted that this is applied to all existing bookings, hitting families and those travelling on low cost flights the most!
